p: In the context of CHDP activity against this virus, super physiological concentrations (100 and 200 μg/ml) of HNP-1 peptide were shown to directly inhibit CMV viral particles reducing the PFU/ml by 0.29 and 0.81 log 10, respectively (Daher et al. 1986). However, this virus notably showed less susceptibility to HNP-1 compared to HSV-1, which was also assessed in the same study.
